item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:24 Chances: Rocket Lab USA shares have skyrocketed after winning a U.S. government contract worth up to $515 million, indicating strong growth potential for the company. The successful launch of its tenth Electron rocket and deployment of a satellite for a Japan-based Earth imaging company showcases Rocket Lab’s continued execution and technological capabilities in the space industry.
